bug.author: yangou1988
bug.summary: Web portal - Jobs ( left navigation ) filtered Status automatically
bug.description:
Short summary about the issue/question: Web portal - Jobs ( left navigation ) filtered Status automatically if clicked the home's job status before. Brief what process you are following:
Click any 'view all' button of Job status at Home page (example: Succeeded) url: https://int.openp.ai/job-list.html?status=Succeeded&user=
visit other pages
Click Jobs in left navigation
Jobs filtered status 'Succeeded' automatically not all jobs url: https://int.openp.ai/job-list.html

comments.comment: After discussing with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yangou1988>@yangou1988</denchmark-link> , with remain this behavior in this release.
